data.actual_result: The spinning wheel appears for a second, followed by a black screen and the app crashing in quick succession.
data.short_description: App crashes instantly upon opening, often multiple times in a row [on both Testflight and non-Testflight versions]. I have only had it happen on iOS 11 betas 2-4 so far, yet to upgrade to 5 and test.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the app on your iDevice.
